name: General Consultation
description: Initial consultation with a board-certified general practitioner
whatIsIncluded: Medical history review, vital signs assessment, general physical examination, initial diagnosis, and treatment recommendations
howItsDone: In-person at our clinic or via secure video call

name: Dental Cleaning & Checkup
description: Professional teeth cleaning and comprehensive dental examination
whatIsIncluded: Professional plaque and tartar removal, teeth polishing, cavity screening, oral hygiene assessment, fluoride treatment
howItsDone: In-person at our clinic. Patient sits in dental chair for cleaning and examination.
specialPreparation: Please brush and floss before appointment. Avoid eating 30 minutes prior if possible.

name: Blood Test & Analysis
description: Comprehensive blood work and laboratory analysis
whatIsIncluded: Blood draw, complete blood count, metabolic panel, cholesterol screening, and detailed analysis report
howItsDone: Quick blood draw at our lab, results available within 24-48 hours
specialPreparation: Fasting of 8-12 hours recommended for accurate results. Please bring your insurance card.

name: Eye Examination
description: Comprehensive eye health examination and vision assessment
whatIsIncluded: Visual acuity testing, eye pressure measurement, retinal examination, color blindness test, and prescription assessment
howItsDone: In-person at our clinic with our certified optometrist
specialPreparation: Bring current glasses or contacts if you use them. Avoid eye makeup on exam day.

name: Follow-up Visit
description: Routine follow-up appointment after initial treatment or examination
whatIsIncluded: Assessment of previous treatment, vital signs check, prescription refills if needed, adjusted recommendations
howItsDone: In-person at clinic or via secure video call. Requires previous visit or referral.

name: Vaccination Service
whatIsIncluded: Consultation about vaccine benefits, vaccine administration, observation period, vaccination record documentation
howItsDone: In-person at our clinic. Usually a quick injection and brief observation.
specialPreparation: Bring insurance card and any previous vaccination records. Inform staff of allergies.

name: Physical Therapy Session
description: Therapeutic exercises and rehabilitation for injuries or conditions
whatIsIncluded: Assessment of mobility and pain, customized exercise program, manual therapy techniques, progress monitoring, home exercise recommendations
howItsDone: In-person at our clinic with a licensed physical therapist in equipped therapy room
specialPreparation: Wear comfortable, loose-fitting clothes. Bring any medical reports related to your condition.

name: Mental Health Consultation
description: Counseling and mental health assessment with licensed therapist
whatIsIncluded: Initial assessment, confidential discussion, coping strategies, treatment plan, therapy recommendations, referrals if needed
howItsDone: In-person at our clinic in a private, confidential setting or via secure video call
specialPreparation: Please be ready to discuss your concerns openly. All sessions are confidential per healthcare privacy laws.
